amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions of the bill that provide for a "good faith" exception to the exclusionary rule regarding warrantless searches. The amendment would reaffirm the IV amendment prohibition against unreasonable search and seizure. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 6 in the Congressional Record of February 6, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 303 (Roll no. 99).
